original_text: Elihu had waited for Job's three friends to speak before he spoke to Job himself. He waited because he was younger than them.
korean_text: 엘리후는 그들의 나이가 자기보다 여러 해 위이므로 욥에게 말하기를 참고 있다가

sentences.original_text: Elihu had waited for Job's three friends to speak
sentences.korean_translation: 엘리후는 욥의 세 친구가 말하기를 기다렸다

sentences.original_text: before he spoke to Job himself
He waited because he was younger than them
